short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take screenshots from youtube videos and recognize texts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recognise and get text from youtube videos on the go. This Chrome extension allows to capture screenshots from Youtube videos and recognise texts using OCR algorithm.

1. Capture and save screenshots.
2. Recognise and get texts from lines or text blocks.
3. Supported languages: English, German, Hebrew, Russian, Arabic, Japanese
4. Copy/Paste texts from recognised screenshots.
